pinyin: xian4 piao4 ling4 he2 gan1 san1 lin2 suan1

sentences.chinese: 提供了分离的多核苷酸。

sentences.english: The bases and pentoses of the common nucleotides are heterocyclic compounds.
sentences.chinese: 常见核苷酸中的碱基和戊糖是杂环化合物。

sentences.english: Suppose you are working with oligonucleotides 32 nucleotides in length.
sentences.chinese: 假设你在用32核苷酸长度的寡核苷酸工作。

sentences.english: Suppose you are working with oligonucleotides 32 nucleotides in length.
sentences.chinese: 假设你在用32核苷酸长度的寡核苷酸工作。

sentences.english: The activity of nevirapine does not compete with template or nucleoside triphosphates.
sentences.chinese: 奈韦拉平不与底物或三磷酸核苷产生竞争。

sentences.english: The positive control targets were labeled with the directly incorporated fluorescently labeled dNTP labeling.
sentences.chinese: 阳性对照采用荧光标记寡核苷酸直接掺入法进行标记。

sentences.english: Isonucleosides represent a new class of nucleoside analogues.
sentences.chinese: 异核苷代表了一类新的核苷类似物。

sentences.english: Isonucleosides represent a new class of nucleoside analogues.
sentences.chinese: 异核苷代表了一类新的核苷类似物。
多核苷酸键是螺旋形的。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to regulate activity of target RNA oligonucleotides.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及用于调节靶RNA活性的寡核苷酸。

sentences.english: A typical molecule of DNA contains up to three billion nucleotides.
sentences.chinese: 一个DNA分子中包含了至少三十亿个核苷酸。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the method of gene linkage analysis and that of using oligonucleotide probe are compared.
sentences.chinese: 同时将基因的连锁分析法与寡核苷酸法进行了比较。

sentences.english: Most genes average more than 1000 nucleotides.
sentences.chinese: 大部分基因平均有超过1000个核苷酸。

sentences.english: Those nucleotides hooked up into strands as more seeped inside.
sentences.chinese: 随着内陷，这些核苷酸链扭绞成股。

sentences.english: Sequence analysis showed that homology of nucleotide and amino acid of ts was high.
sentences.chinese: 核苷酸序列与氨基酸同源性分析表明该片段较为保守。

definition: Lamivudine, reverse transcriptase inhibitor marketed by GlaxoSmithKline and widely used in the treatment of hepatitis B and AIDS/brand names include Zeffix, Heptovir, Epivir and Epivir-HBV
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)
uracil nucleotide (U, pairs with adenine A 腺嘌呤 in RNA)
